default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

id.description: The id of the created identity.

name.description: The name of the created identity.

location.description: The Azure region where the identity lives.

properties.description: The properties associated with the identity.

IdentityProperties.description: The properties associated with the identity.
IdentityProperties.title: Identity properties.

tenantId.description: The id of the tenant which the identity belongs to.

principalId.description: The id of the service principal object associated with the created identity.

clientId.description: The id of the app associated with the identity. This is a random generated UUID by MSI.

clientSecretUrl.description: The ManagedServiceIdentity DataPlane URL that can be queried to obtain the identity credentials. If identity is user assigned, then the clientSecretUrl will not be present in the response, otherwise it will be present.

value.description: The collection of userAssignedIdentities returned by the listing operation.

nextLink.description: The url to get the next page of results, if any.

UserAssignedIdentitiesListResult.description: Values returned by the List operation.

error.description: A list of additional details about the error.

CloudError.description: An error response from the ManagedServiceIdentity service.

message.description: A message describing the error, intended to be suitable for display in a user interface.

target.description: The target of the particular error. For example, the name of the property in error.

details.description: A list of additional details about the error.

CloudErrorBody.description: An error response from the ManagedServiceIdentity service.

Operation.title: Microsoft.ManagedIdentity Operation.
Operation.description: Operation supported by the Microsoft.ManagedIdentity REST API.

name.title: Operation Name.
name.description: The name of the REST Operation. This is of the format {provider}/{resource}/{operation}.

display.title: Operation Display.
display.description: The object that describes the operation.

OperationDisplay.title: Operation Display.
OperationDisplay.description: The object that describes the operation.

provider.title: Resource Provider Name.
provider.description: Friendly name of the resource provider.

operation.title: Operation Type.
operation.description: The type of operation. For example: read, write, delete.

resource.title: Resource Type.
resource.description: The resource type on which the operation is performed.

OperationListResult.title: Operations List.
OperationListResult.description: A list of operations supported by Microsoft.ManagedIdentity Resource Provider.

value.title: Operations List.
value.description: A list of operations supported by Microsoft.ManagedIdentity Resource Provider.

nextLink.title: Next Link
nextLink.description: The url to get the next page of results, if any.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: The Id of the Subscription to which the identity belongs.

ResourceGroupNameParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupNameParameter.description: The name of the Resource Group to which the identity belongs.

ResourceNameParameter.name: resourceName
ResourceNameParameter.description: The name of the identity resource.
